metadata.Title: CVE-2019-20386 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in button_open in login/logind-button.c in systemd before 243. When executing the udevadm trigger command, a memory leak may occur.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2019-20386` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libnss-myhostname - 244-3ubuntu1
libnss-mymachines - 244-3ubuntu1
libnss-resolve - 244-3ubuntu1
libnss-systemd - 244-3ubuntu1
libpam-systemd - 244-3ubuntu1
libsystemd0 - 244-3ubuntu1
libudev1 - 244-3ubuntu1
systemd - 244-3ubuntu1
systemd-container - 244-3ubuntu1
systemd-coredump - 244-3ubuntu1
systemd-journal-remote - 244-3ubuntu1
systemd-sysv - 244-3ubuntu1
systemd-tests - 244-3ubuntu1
systemd-timesyncd - 244-3ubuntu1
udev - 244-3ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: systemd package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '244-3ubuntu1').
